document.query: INSERT INTO `provider_setting` (`id`, `name`, `value`, `type`, `provider_id`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES (NULL, 'isEnabled', '1', '', (SELECT id FROM provider where name = 'simplex'), NOW(), NOW());
